And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that when<S>3753</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had finished<S>5055</S> these<S>5128</S> sayings<S>3056</S>, he departed<S>3332</S> from<S>575</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, and<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the coasts<S>3725</S> of Judaea<S>2449</S> beyond<S>4008</S> Jordan<S>2446</S>;
And<S>2532</S> great<S>4183</S> multitudes<S>3793</S> followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> he healed<S>2323</S> them<S>846</S> there<S>1563</S>.
The Pharisees<S>5330</S> also<S>2532</S> came<S>4334</S> unto him<S>846</S>, tempting<S>3985</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Is it lawful<S>1487</S> <S>1832</S> for a man<S>444</S> to put away<S>630</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S> for<S>2596</S> every<S>3956</S> cause<S>156</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Have ye<S>314</S> not<S>3756</S> read<S>314</S>, that<S>3754</S> he which<S>3588</S> made<S>4160</S> them at<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S> made<S>4160</S> them<S>846</S> male<S>730</S> and<S>2532</S> female<S>2338</S>,
And<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, For this<S>5127</S> cause<S>1752</S> shall a man<S>444</S> leave<S>2641</S> father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> mother<S>3384</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall cleave<S>4347</S> to his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>: and<S>2532</S> they twain<S>1417</S> shall be<S>2071</S> <S>1519</S> one<S>3391</S> flesh<S>4561</S>?
Wherefore<S>5620</S> they are<S>1526</S> no more<S>3765</S> twain<S>1417</S>, but<S>235</S> one<S>3391</S> flesh<S>4561</S>. What<S>3739</S> therefore<S>3767</S> God<S>2316</S> hath joined together<S>4801</S>, let<S>5563</S> not<S>3361</S> man<S>444</S> put asunder<S>5563</S>.
They say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Why<S>5101</S> did Moses<S>3475</S> then<S>3767</S> command<S>1781</S> to give<S>1325</S> a writing<S>975</S> of divorcement<S>647</S>, and<S>2532</S> to put<S>630</S> her<S>846</S> away<S>630</S>?
He saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, <S>3754</S> Moses<S>3475</S> because of<S>4314</S> the hardness<S>4641</S> of your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>4641</S> suffered<S>2010</S> you<S>5213</S> to put away<S>630</S> your<S>5216</S> wives<S>1135</S>: but<S>1161</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S> it was<S>1096</S> not<S>3756</S> so<S>3779</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> Whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall put away<S>630</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>, except<S>1508</S> it be for<S>1909</S> fornication<S>4202</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall marry<S>1060</S> another<S>243</S>, committeth adultery<S>3429</S>: and<S>2532</S> whoso marrieth<S>1060</S> her which<S>3588</S> is put away<S>630</S> doth commit adultery<S>3429</S>.
His<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, If<S>1487</S> the case<S>156</S> of the man<S>444</S> be<S>2076</S> so<S>3779</S> with<S>3326</S> his wife<S>1135</S>, it is<S>4851</S> not<S>3756</S> good<S>4851</S> to marry<S>1060</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, All<S>3956</S> men cannot<S>3756</S> receive<S>5562</S> this<S>5126</S> saying<S>3056</S>, save<S>235</S> they to whom<S>3739</S> it is given<S>1325</S>.
For<S>1063</S> there are<S>1526</S> some eunuchs<S>2135</S>, which<S>3748</S> were so<S>3779</S> born<S>1080</S> from<S>1537</S> their mother's<S>3384</S> womb<S>2836</S>: and<S>2532</S> there are<S>1526</S> some eunuchs<S>2135</S>, which<S>3748</S> were made eunuchs<S>2134</S> of<S>5259</S> men<S>444</S>: and<S>2532</S> there be<S>1526</S> eunuchs<S>2135</S>, which<S>3748</S> have made<S>2134</S> themselves<S>1438</S> eunuchs<S>2134</S> for<S>1223</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven's sake<S>3772</S>. He that is able<S>1410</S> to receive<S>5562</S> it, let him receive<S>5562</S> it.
Then<S>5119</S> were there brought<S>4374</S> unto him<S>846</S> little children<S>3813</S>, that<S>2443</S> he should put<S>2007</S> his hands<S>5495</S> on<S>2007</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> pray<S>4336</S>: and<S>1161</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> rebuked<S>2008</S> them<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S>, Suffer<S>863</S> little children<S>3813</S>, and<S>2532</S> forbid<S>2967</S> them<S>846</S> not<S>3361</S>, to come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>: for<S>1063</S> of such<S>5108</S> is<S>2076</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he laid<S>2007</S> his hands<S>5495</S> on<S>2007</S> them<S>846</S>, and departed<S>4198</S> thence<S>1564</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, one<S>1520</S> came<S>4334</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Good<S>18</S> Master<S>1320</S>, what<S>5101</S> good thing<S>18</S> shall I do<S>4160</S>, that<S>2443</S> I may have<S>2192</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Why<S>5101</S> callest thou<S>3004</S> me<S>3165</S> good<S>18</S>? there is none<S>3762</S> good<S>18</S> but<S>1508</S> one<S>1520</S>, that is, God<S>2316</S>: but<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> thou wilt<S>2309</S> enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S>, keep<S>5083</S> the commandments<S>1785</S>.
He saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Which<S>4169</S>?<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S>, Thou shalt do<S>5407</S> no<S>3756</S> murder<S>5407</S>, Thou shalt<S>3431</S> not<S>3756</S> commit adultery<S>3431</S>, Thou shalt<S>2813</S> not<S>3756</S> steal<S>2813</S>, Thou shalt<S>5576</S> not<S>3756</S> bear false witness<S>5576</S>,
Honour<S>5091</S> thy<S>4675</S> father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> thy mother<S>3384</S>: and<S>2532</S>, Thou shalt love<S>25</S> thy<S>4675</S> neighbour<S>4139</S> as<S>5613</S> thyself<S>4572</S>.
The young man<S>3495</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, All<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> have I kept<S>5442</S> from<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> youth up<S>3503</S>: what<S>5101</S> lack<S>5302</S> I yet<S>2089</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>5346</S> unto him<S>846</S>, If<S>1487</S> thou wilt<S>2309</S> be<S>1511</S> perfect<S>5046</S>, go<S>5217</S> and sell<S>4453</S> that thou<S>4675</S> hast<S>5224</S>, and<S>2532</S> give<S>1325</S> to the poor<S>4434</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou shalt have<S>2192</S> treasure<S>2344</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>: and<S>2532</S> come<S>1204</S> and follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when the young man<S>3495</S> heard<S>191</S> that saying<S>3056</S>, he went away<S>565</S> sorrowful<S>3076</S>: for<S>1063</S> he had<S>2192</S> <S>2258</S> great<S>4183</S> possessions<S>2933</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> a rich man<S>4145</S> shall hardly<S>1423</S> enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>1161</S> again<S>3825</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, It is<S>2076</S> easier<S>2123</S> for a camel<S>2574</S> to go<S>1330</S> through<S>1223</S> the eye<S>5169</S> of a needle<S>4476</S>, than<S>2228</S> for a rich man<S>4145</S> to enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
When<S>1161</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> heard<S>191</S> it, they were exceedingly<S>4970</S> amazed<S>1605</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Who<S>5101</S> then<S>686</S> can<S>1410</S> be saved<S>4982</S>?
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> beheld<S>1689</S> them, and said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, With<S>3844</S> men<S>444</S> this<S>5124</S> is<S>2076</S> impossible<S>102</S>; but<S>1161</S> with<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S> all things<S>3956</S> are<S>2076</S> possible<S>1415</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> answered<S>611</S> Peter<S>4074</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, we<S>2249</S> have forsaken<S>863</S> all<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> followed<S>190</S> thee<S>4671</S>; what<S>5101</S> shall we<S>2254</S> have<S>2071</S> therefore<S>686</S>?
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> ye<S>5210</S> which<S>3588</S> have followed<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>, in<S>1722</S> the regeneration<S>3824</S> when<S>3752</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> shall sit<S>2523</S> in<S>1909</S> the throne<S>2362</S> of his<S>846</S> glory<S>1391</S>, ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> shall sit<S>2523</S> upon<S>1909</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thrones<S>2362</S>, judging<S>2919</S> the twelve<S>1427</S> tribes<S>5443</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>.
And<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> one<S>3739</S> that hath forsaken<S>863</S> houses<S>3614</S>, or<S>2228</S> brethren<S>80</S>, or<S>2228</S> sisters<S>79</S>, or<S>2228</S> father<S>3962</S>, or<S>2228</S> mother<S>3384</S>, or<S>2228</S> wife<S>1135</S>, or<S>2228</S> children<S>5043</S>, or<S>2228</S> lands<S>68</S>, for my<S>3450</S> name's<S>3686</S> sake<S>1752</S>, shall receive<S>2983</S> an hundredfold<S>1542</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall inherit<S>2816</S> everlasting<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>.
But<S>1161</S> many<S>4183</S> that are first<S>4413</S> shall be<S>2071</S> last<S>2078</S>; and<S>2532</S> the last<S>2078</S> shall be first<S>4413</S>.
